mapper.select: SELECT t.todo_id AS todoId, t.exercise_id AS exerciseId, e.name AS exerciseName, t.sets_number AS setsNumber, t.reps_target AS repsTarget, t.rest_time AS restTime, t.is_completed AS isCompleted, e.default_calories_per_set AS caloriesPerRep, (t.reps_target * e.default_calories_per_set) AS burnedCalories FROM todos t JOIN exercises e ON t.exercise_id = e.exercise_id WHERE t.date = #{date} ORDER BY t.todo_id ASC

SELECT t.todo_id AS todoId, t.exercise_id AS exerciseId, e.name AS exerciseName, t.sets_number AS setsNumber, t.reps_target AS repsTarget, t.rest_time AS restTime, t.is_completed AS isCompleted FROM todos t JOIN exercises e ON t.exercise_id = e.exercise_id WHERE t.date = #{date} ORDER BY t.todo_id ASC
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.reps_target * e.default_calories_per_set), 0) FROM todos t JOIN exercises e ON t.exercise_id = e.exercise_id WHERE t.date = #{date} AND t.is_completed = TRUE
